summary: In order to adopt an abandoned baby, an actress arranges a marriage of convenience with a doctor.
cast: Marlene Dietrich|Fred MacMurray|Aline MacMahon|Stanley Ridges|Arline Judge|Roger Clark|Marietta Canty|David James|Ruth Ford|Harvey Stephens|Harry Shannon|Elisabeth Risdon|Charles Lane|Murray Alper|Kitty Kelly|Eddie Acuff|Ernie Adams|Helen Ainsworth|Myrtle Anderson|Georgia Backus|Eugene Borden|Romaine Callender|Chester Clute|Jimmy Conlin|Lorna Dunn|Lou Fulton|Eddie Hall|Charles Halton|Neil Hamilton|Sterling Holloway|Robert Emmett Keane|Carl M. Leviness|Judith Linden|Edward McWade|Frances Morris|William Newell|Paul Oman|Suzanne Ridgway|Ray Walker
title: Capricho de mujer
